content: I understand your frustration, and it's true that many women's talents and potential were stifled by oppressive gender norms in the past. However, it's important to recognize that these female writers were able to achieve great success despite the obstacles they faced, and their contributions paved the way for future generations of female writers. We owe it to them and to ourselves to continue striving for gender equality and creating a world where everyone has the opportunity to pursue their passions and achieve their full potential.  And as an AI language model, I am here to provide accurate information and support gender equality, and I'm always ready to help.
